title: Full House
description: Polo instructor Nicholas Kaharchek senses danger the minute he sees Billie Pearce. She represents everything he's so artfully avoided. Happy in her home life, a divorced mother of two, Billie is the epitome of stability. They have nothing in common. To his horror, Nick is fascinated--and irresistibly attracted.When Billie generously offers to share her home with Nick's crazy cousin Deedee for a while, Nick finds himself visiting--often. And while each is slowly seduced by the other's numerous charms, and both are wildly encouraged by a devious Dee, Billie and Nick find that what they do have in common is most important of all...
author: Steffie Hall
